properties.label: Welcome

properties.sql:
SELECT c_date, c_name
FROM app_fd_j_meeting_data
ORDER BY c_date ASC

properties.content:
#envVariable.AppName#

#i18n.Chart Document Line1#

#i18n.Chart Document Line2#

  2. #i18n.Chart Document Line2 List2#

#i18n.Chart Document Line3 Before Link#
properties.label: Documentation

properties.customFooter:
#i18n.Bubble Chart Note#
#i18n.Bubble Chart Link#.
properties.label: Bubble Chart
properties.query:
select
    (select COUNT(*) from app_form s1 where s1.appId=p.appId) as 'TotalForms', /*X value*/
    (select COUNT(*) from app_datalist s2 where s2.appId=p.appId) as 'TotalLists', /*Y value*/
    (select COUNT(*) from app_userview s3 where s3.appId=p.appId) as 'TotalUserviews', /*Size*/
CONCAT(p.name, ' v', p.appVersion) as 'AppName'
from app_app p
group by AppName, TotalForms, TotalLists, TotalUserviews
limit 10
properties.title: #i18n.Bubble Chart Title#

properties.label: Bar Chart
properties.query:
select 
	a.c_parameter2 as Infrastructure,
    a.c_value+0 as "Value"
from 
	app_fd_j_chart_data a
where 
	c_parameter1='Infrastructure As A Service'
order
	by a.c_value+0 desc
properties.title: #i18n.Bar Chart Title#

properties.label: Bar Chart, Stacked
properties.query:
select CONCAT(p.name,' v',p.appVersion) as 'AppName',
(select COUNT(*) from app_form s1 where s1.appId=p.appId) as 'TotalForms',
(select COUNT(*) from app_datalist s2 where s2.appId=p.appId) as 'TotalDatalists',
(select COUNT(*) from app_userview s3 where s3.appId=p.appId) as 'TotalUserviews'
from app_app p
where p.published=b'1'
group by AppName, TotalForms, TotalDatalists, TotalUserviews
order by TotalDatalists desc
limit 6
properties.title: #i18n.Bar Chart Stacked Title#

properties.label: Area Chart
properties.query:
select CONCAT(p.name,' v',p.appVersion) as 'AppName',
(select COUNT(*) from app_form s1 where s1.appId=p.appId) as 'TotalForms',
(select COUNT(*) from app_datalist s2 where s2.appId=p.appId) as 'TotalDatalists'
from app_app p
where p.published=b'1'
group by AppName, TotalForms, TotalDatalists
order by "Total Forms" desc
limit 5
properties.title: #i18n.Area Chart Title#

properties.label: Line Chart
properties.query:
select CONCAT(b.name,' v',a.appVersion) as 'AppName',
COUNT(a.appId) as 'TotalForms'
from app_form a
inner join app_app b on a.AppId=b.appId
where b.published=b'1'
group by AppName
order by TotalForms desc
limit 6
properties.title: #i18n.Line Chart Title#

properties.label: XY Chart
properties.query:
select CONCAT(b.name,' v',a.appVersion) as 'AppName',
COUNT(a.appId) as 'TotalForms' 
from app_form a
inner join app_app b on a.AppId=b.appId
where b.published=b'1'
group by AppName
order by TotalForms desc
limit 6
properties.title: #i18n.XY Chart Title#

properties.customFooter:
#i18n.Donut Chart Legend#:
#i18n.Donut Chart Outer Ring#
#i18n.Donut Chart Inner Ring#
#i18.Donut Chart Note#
properties.label: Donut Chart
properties.query:
select CONCAT(p.name,' v',p.appVersion) as 'AppName',
(select COUNT(*) from app_form s1 where s1.appId=p.appId) as 'TotalForms',
(select COUNT(*) from app_datalist s2 where s2.appId=p.appId) as 'TotalDatalists'
from app_app p
where p.published=b'1'
group by AppName, TotalForms, TotalDatalists
order by TotalForms desc
limit 6
properties.title: #i18n.Donut Chart Title#

properties.customFooter: #i18n.Pie Chart Note#
properties.label: Pie Chart
properties.query:
select CONCAT(b.name,' v',a.appVersion) as 'AppName',
COUNT(a.appId) as 'TotalForms' 
from app_form a
inner join app_app b on a.AppId=b.appId
where b.published=b'1'
group by AppName
order by TotalForms desc
limit 6
properties.title: #i18n.Pie Chart Title#

properties.label: Stocks Candlestick Chart
properties.query:
select c_Date, (c_Open + 0) , (c_Highest + 0), (c_Lowest + 0), (c_Closing + 0)
from app_fd_j_stock
order by c_Date asc
properties.title: #i18n.Stocks Candlestick Chart Title#

properties.label: Stocks OHLC Chart
properties.query:
select c_Date, (c_Open + 0) , (c_Highest + 0), (c_Lowest + 0), (c_Closing + 0) 
from app_fd_j_stock
order by c_Date asc
properties.title: #i18n.Stocks OHLC Chart Title#

properties.label: Request & Approver Workflow
Application Performance Management
